languages.text: {n}Судя по дорогому наряду и выставленной напоказ аугментике, богатство Луссария вряд ли напрямую зависит от продажи редкостей. Его присутствие здесь больше похоже на зов души, чем на желание набить карманы.{/n}

{n}Judging by his expensive attire and ostentatious augmetics, Lussarius's wealth is unlikely to stem directly from his curiosity business. He came here following his heart, it seems, and not his greed.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Судя по дорогому наряду и выставленной напоказ аугментике, богатство Луссария вряд ли напрямую зависит от продажи редкостей. Его присутствие здесь больше похоже на зов души, чем на желание набить карманы.{/n}

{n}Judging by his expensive attire and ostentatious augmetics, Lussarius's wealth is unlikely to stem directly from his curiosity business. He came here following his heart, it seems, and not his greed.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Seiner teuren Kleidung und den prunkvollen Augmentationen nach zu urteilen, dürfte Lussarius' Wohlstand kaum ausschließlich von seinem Kuriositätenhandel herrühren. Anscheinend ist er hier, weil er seinem Herz gefolgt ist, nicht seiner Gier.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by his expensive attire and ostentatious augmetics, Lussarius's wealth is unlikely to stem directly from his curiosity business. He came here following his heart, it seems, and not his greed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Seiner teuren Kleidung und den prunkvollen Augmentationen nach zu urteilen, dürfte Lussarius' Wohlstand kaum ausschließlich von seinem Kuriositätenhandel herrühren. Anscheinend ist er hier, weil er seinem Herz gefolgt ist, nicht seiner Gier.{/n}

languages.text: {n}À en croire sa tenue et ses augmétiques tape-à-l'œil, la richesse de Lussarius ne provient sûrement pas uniquement de son commerce de curiosités. Son cœur l'a mené jusqu'ici, et non sa cupidité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by his expensive attire and ostentatious augmetics, Lussarius's wealth is unlikely to stem directly from his curiosity business. He came here following his heart, it seems, and not his greed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À en croire sa tenue et ses augmétiques tape-à-l'œil, la richesse de Lussarius ne provient sûrement pas uniquement de son commerce de curiosités. Son cœur l'a mené jusqu'ici, et non sa cupidité.{/n}

languages.text: {n}从卢萨利乌斯昂贵的服饰与浮夸的植入物判断，他的财富不太可能是通过奇珍生意赚来的。看来，他之所以会来这里，并不像是为了利益，更像是出于本心。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by his expensive attire and ostentatious augmetics, Lussarius's wealth is unlikely to stem directly from his curiosity business. He came here following his heart, it seems, and not his greed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}从卢萨利乌斯昂贵的服饰与浮夸的植入物判断，他的财富不太可能是通过奇珍生意赚来的。看来，他之所以会来这里，并不像是为了利益，更像是出于本心。{/n}

languages.text: {n}A juzgar por su atuendo caro y sus auméticos ostentosos, no es probable que la riqueza de Lussarius provenga directamente de su negocio de curiosidades. Por lo que parece, vino guiado por su corazón y no su codicia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by his expensive attire and ostentatious augmetics, Lussarius's wealth is unlikely to stem directly from his curiosity business. He came here following his heart, it seems, and not his greed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A juzgar por su atuendo caro y sus auméticos ostentosos, no es probable que la riqueza de Lussarius provenga directamente de su negocio de curiosidades. Por lo que parece, vino guiado por su corazón y no su codicia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}その高価な衣服と誇示するようなオーグメティックから判断するに、ルッサリウスの財産は珍品の商売から直接得たものとは考えにくい。どうやら彼は貪欲さからではなく、心の赴くままにここへ来たようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by his expensive attire and ostentatious augmetics, Lussarius's wealth is unlikely to stem directly from his curiosity business. He came here following his heart, it seems, and not his greed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その高価な衣服と誇示するようなオーグメティックから判断するに、ルッサリウスの財産は珍品の商売から直接得たものとは考えにくい。どうやら彼は貪欲さからではなく、心の赴くままにここへ来たようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Giyimi ve gösterişli ogmetikleri göz önünde bulundurulduğunda Lussarius'un, değirmenini döndüren başka su kaynakları da var gibi duruyor. Anlaşılan onu buraya hırsı değil tutkusu getirmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Judging by his expensive attire and ostentatious augmetics, Lussarius's wealth is unlikely to stem directly from his curiosity business. He came here following his heart, it seems, and not his greed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Giyimi ve gösterişli ogmetikleri göz önünde bulundurulduğunda, Lussarius'un değirmeninin döndüren başka su kaynakları da var gibi duruyor. Anlaşılan onu buraya hırsı değil tutkusu getirmiş.{/n}
